Package com.mewna.catnip.entity.channel

Interface MessageChannel

All Superinterfaces:
Channel, Entity, Snowflake, Timestamped
All Known Subinterfaces:
DMChannel, GroupDMChannel, NewsChannel, TextChannel, ThreadChannel, UserDMChannel
All Known Implementing Classes:
GroupDMChannelImpl, NewsChannelImpl, TextChannelImpl, ThreadChannelImpl, UserDMChannelImpl
public interface MessageChannel
extends Channel
A channel that can have messages sent in it.
Since:
9/12/18
Author:
natanbc
